pages.text: The antimatter launcher is a weapon that launches projectiles of antimatter. If these projectiles hit anything they will explode and create a radiation burst. $(bold)$(#ff0000) Be careful with it. Radiation bursts can instantly kill a player!$()

You should always fire as far as possible away from your self and carry a Geiger counter to see your own radiation level. It can use any antimatter cell as ammunition. The heavy types have a bigger explosion size and radiation amount.
